DeKALB  Missed opportunities and a lack of defense from NIU mens soccer  led to a tough  loss against the University of WisconsinMilwaukee Panthers  in an honorary night for the Lewang Cup PERIOD

The Lewang cup honors John Lewang former.. PERIOD

Coming off a win against Southern Illinois University Edwardsville NIU mens basketball went on the road for the first of its fourgame roadtrip PERIOD On Friday the Huskies  were defeated by UWMilwaukee  in a game that took overtime to decide.. PERIOD

It was a tale of two halves in Saturdays game between NIUs mens rugby and the University of WisconsinMilwaukee Panthers PERIOD The Huskies got off to a good start against the Panthers leading  at halftime PERIOD The second  minutes was a different.. PERIOD

In its second MAC series of the season NIU will play host to Akron for a threegame series from Friday to Sunday PERIOD NIU   MAC is coming off a win at home against UWMilwaukee and will come in on two days rest PERIOD Akron   MAC will come.. PERIOD

A solid start from Jake Hermsen and timely offense helped NIU mens baseball defeat UWMilwaukee  at Ralph McKinzie Field Tuesday PERIOD The Huskies   MAC were in a hole to begin the game the Panthers scored  a run in the top of the first.. PERIOD
